title: Treasure Hunting Journey
description: All of the facts regarding a treasure hunting journey including destination and treasure splits

destination.description: The target location for this journey where the hunters will go.

treasureSplit.description: The type of splits for this journey. 50/50, 25/25/25/25, and so forth. Must add up to 100.

partyThreshold.description: The minimum party member threshold needed to charter this journey

journeyEndorser.description: The AID of the ATHENA inner circle member endorsing this treasure hunting journey.

l.const: Signing of the Treasure Hunting Journey split agreement binds the signers to split the treasure received from the journey according to the split terms specified..
